page.title: 03KIP MARINA IN KIP VALLEY
page.content: The Kip Marina is a centre of recreation and tourism situated on the road from Greenock to Largs on the opposite side from Inverkip Village. In the Kip Marina there are over 700 berths and it is open twelve months a year. The car park of the Marina has spaces for 2000 cars. The Kip Marina has a forty ton boat hoist. It also has service and repair facilities and also a well stocked chandlery. It has a 24 hour radio watch. Many boat owners at Kip Marina live up to 250 miles away from Inverkip and are quite happy to travel each weekend from the north of England to take advantage of the Clyde cruising waters. It has walk on pontoons and you can sail at any state of the tide.
